suite.name: X

test.name: Perform Actions on Window Operations Page and Verify

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Switch Window
kw.arg: A place to practice your automation skills!
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Match Regexp
kw.doc: Fails if ``string`` does not match ``pattern`` as a regular expression.
